question: What is the main purpose of the ComfyUI LLM Party project?
answer: The main purpose of the ComfyUI LLM Party project is to develop a complete set of nodes for LLM workflow construction based on ComfyUI as the front end, allowing users to quickly and conveniently build their own LLM workflows and easily integrate them into existing image workflows.

question: What are some key features of the ComfyUI LLM Party project?
answer: Some key features of the project include API integration or local large model integration, modular implementation for tool invocation, local knowledge base integration with RAG support, ability to invoke code interpreters, online queries including Google search support, and implementation of conditional statements within ComfyUI to categorize user queries and provide targeted responses.

question: What models are supported by the ComfyUI LLM Party project?
answer: The project supports all API calls in OpenAI format, most of the local models supported by the transformer library AutoModelForCausalLM class, and model downloads from Baidu cloud.

question: How can users configure APIKEY in the ComfyUI LLM Party project?
answer: Users can configure APIKEY using two methods: by entering the openai_api_key and base_url in the config.ini file in the project folder, or by entering them directly in the Large Language Model (LLM) node in the ComfyUI interface.

question: What are the future plans for the ComfyUI LLM Party project?
answer: Future plans include more model adaptations, more ways to build agents, more automation features, more knowledge base management functions, and more tools and persona.

question: How can users support the ComfyUI LLM Party project?
answer: Users can support the project by joining the community through discord, QQ group, or WeChat group, following updates on Bilibili or OpenArt accounts, and making donations via provided payment methods.

question: What is the purpose of the text iterator node in the ComfyUI LLM Party project?
answer: The text iterator node allows outputting only part of the characters at a time, safely splitting text according to Carriage Return and chunk size without dividing from the middle of the text. It enables entering super long text in batches.
